name: div
features: Seamless Construction: 80% nylon / 20% spandex, using seamless technology for comfort & durability
Compression Fit: Provides compression to improve circulation, muscle support, & joint stability
Stay-Put Design: Ribbed cuffs with 2 silicone strips keep the sleeve securely in place during activity
Breathable Material: Breathable fabric ensures comfort during extended use
Single Sleeve: Includes 1 arm sleeve per package
